abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "MediaType is Image", "TaxonKey is Urtica dioica L." ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Dataflos 1 records from The Fungal Collection of Helga Große-Brauckmann at the Botanische Staatssammlung München 1 records from Institut Botanic de Barcelona (IBB, CSIC-Ajuntament de Barcelona), BC-Plantae 1 records from ALA species sightings and OzAtlas 1 records from Invertebrate Zoology Division, Yale Peabody Museum 1 records from The Myxomycetes Collections at the Botanische Staatssammlung München - Main Collection 1 records from Clémence Lortet herbarium 1 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Botany) Seed Plant Collection 1 records from Berea College, Ralph L. Thompson Herbarium 1 records from The Vascular Plants Collection of the University of Goettingen 1 records from Herbarium of Numto Nature Park 1 records from Horti sicci by Siiri Kõljalg 1 records from Earth Guardians Weekly Feed 1 records from Central Siberian Botanical Garden Herbarium (NS, NSK) 1 records from Herbarium specimens of Jardins botaniques and Conservatoire Botanique of Nancy (NCY) 1 records from Herbarium of the State Nature Reserve "Tigireksky" (TIGZ) 1 records from Arkansas Tech University Herbarium 1 records from Collection d'animaux marins et plantes du Museum d'Histoire Naturelle de Nice 1 records from Virtual Herbarium ALTB (South-Siberian Botanical Garden) 1 records from SFV - California State University, Northridge 1 records from FSC - Fresno State Herbarium 1 records from University of Colorado Museum of Natural History Herbarium Vascular Plant Collection 2 records from Vascular plants from European Russia in the CSBG SB RAS Digital herbarium 2 records from RSA -
